snippet: The criticism that the magazine is trying to turn Dzhokhar Tsarnaev into a rock star by putting him on the cover is going too far.
abstract: Editorial rejects wide-scale criticism that Rolling Stone magazine is making accused Boston Marathon bomber Dzhokhar Tsarnaev a celebrity by putting him on its front cover; holds photos on magazine covers are not in any way endorsements.
lead_paragraph: The criticism that the magazine is trying to turn Dzhokhar Tsarnaev into a rock star by putting him on the cover is going too far.

headline.main: Judging Rolling Stone by Its Cover
headline.print_headline: Judging Rolling Stone by Its Cover
